title: Solar Microloans
summary: Microloans enabling households and SMEs to adopt off-grid solar systems.
description: This program finances distributed solar PV systems for rural households and small businesses, improving energy access and reducing diesel generator usage.

title: Reforestation Bonds
summary: Performance-linked bonds funding reforestation and community forestry.
description: Bonds support restoration of degraded lands with native species, generating carbon credits and local employment.

title: Energy Efficiency for SMEs
summary: Retrofits and efficient equipment finance for small and medium enterprises.
description: Program finances efficient motors, lighting, and process upgrades for SMEs, cutting energy costs and emissions.
